verbose_text: In IUGR asthmatic mice, we also found (i) a direct binding of HNF4alpha and PGC1alpha to Vnn1 promoter by ChIP assay; (ii) a direct interaction of HNF4alpha with PGC1alpha; (iii) upregulation of phospho-PI3K p85 / p55 and phospho-Akt Ser473 and downregulation of phospho-PTENT yr366, and (iv) an increase in nuclear NFkappaB p65 and a decrease in cytosolic IkappaB-alpha.
evidence: PGC1alpha to Vnn1 promoter by ChIP assay; (ii) a direct interaction of HNF4alpha with PGC1alpha; (iii) upregulation of phospho-PI3K p85/p55
